website_summaries.verdict: A quality swimsuit in a variety of sizes and designs for girls and boys.
pros: Available in sizes 3 to 18 months in 8 different designs for both girls and boys
Made from quality fabric and is easy to take on and off
Comfortable to wear and play in
cons: Doesn't have any snaps at the bottom for diaper changes

customer_reviews.title: Not Sun protecting
customer_reviews.text: So I loved this suit. Then today we were out in the sun for two hours and my son got a striped sunburn where the white stripes are. I would like my money back because the suit is supposed to be SPF 50+.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia A. Boudreault

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought this sooner, GREAT toddler swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: My son is 27 lbs and I got the 3T for him.... its roomy and easy to take on and off. He normally wears 2T clothing but I dont like for the swim suit to be skin tight. I really love this suit! Its adorable, easy to zip on and off, and protects his skin from the Texas sun. He hates the rash gaurds that go icer his head and I hate that they bunch up, so this is a really great solution bc he is zipped into it and it stays on! Great quality too. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: No diaper access
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 month old who is wearing 3 mos size clothes. The fit is large It's cute but the fabric doesn't seem super breathable and there is no opening to easily change a diaper which I think is critical at this age. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn C

customer_reviews.title: Fits
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 18mo size, which translates to 12-18mo. My 1yr old baby (29lb, 30inches) was on the tailend of wearing 18mo so i was nervous that it wouldn't fit him. But it did with room to spare!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved it on my little girl
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved it on my little girl. My husband is old school doesn't like girls to show a lot off and with bathing suits now a days for little ones I was amazed when I had to go look for one. All I could find was two pieces not putting a two piece on my baby girl. So when I found this one I was super happy. It was a little big on her but she is a preemie so other than that it was amazing the stitching in the sewing is very good quality the zipper is good quality. And looked very cute on her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: My son wears 6-9 month clothes and this suit (size 12 mo) fit comfortably. So the sizing is accurate. 12 month is still a little bit loose on kiddo but not too baggy. The sun protection was effective. I didn’t sunblock my child under his suit right before the water (but did a couple hours prior) and he didn’t burn at all. I really only needed to keep up with sunblocking his legs and feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, sized small
customer_reviews.text: This toddler swimsuit is well made. I ordered both 18m and 24m as I was unsure which would be the best fit for my son. He wears 18m in most brands due to his height. In this item, the tags were 12-18m and 18-24m. We kept the 24m, which will still only fit him for this season. Other than the confusing sizing, it is a great item. I'm thankful for the free returns on clothing items which allowed us to order two sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Love that this cover shoulders
customer_reviews.text: Love that this cover shoulders, arms, and quads, but without snaps on the bottom, the angle to get her arms in the top can be really tough. She is big for her age and at 12 months she was moving up to 18 month things, but this 12-18 month size suit was good for her at 9 months and not really beyond that. If we could get it on, it fit her at 12 months, but it was just too hard to get on.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: Best rash guard ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this swimsuit. First I bought the newborn size and I liked it so much that we bought the same swimsuit on 6M. It looks cute, fits my little one perfectly, it lasted several trips to the pool and beach (we live in Florida and go to the beach and pool at least once per week). It is a really good quality product and very easy to get him on it. I am definitely buying him the 9M one. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: It’s just adorable! So adorable,in fact, that his little cousin showed up to the beach in the same suit! I love the one piece design since his swim shirt rides uphis back- not a problem here! I love the zipper at the neck which helps with getting it on and off. My one criticism would be that I can’t access his bum without taking The Who,e thing off- why don’t these things have snaps like a onesie?
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: My baby was protected!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this adorable swim suit for my 6 month old and it fit perfectly! He’s wearing 12 months so I ordered that size and it wasn’t too tight! It protected him from the sun out at the beach and even got some super cute photos of him too! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia_Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Great suit - get one!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very cute and fits just right. My son is a size 2T in Carter's and we got this in the 24-36 months size. Fits great. Seems comfy and has worn well. We use it at home in the pool and at weekly splash day at daycare. I like the long sleeves bc my son is very fair. This protects skin so I'm using less sunscreen and don't worry about whether teachers apply enough, properly, etc., when he's at school.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great suit for sun protection
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit was everything that I expected. Loved the long-sleeves so that I didn't have to spend so much time putting on as much sunscreen which baby also liked. I thought it might be annoying to have a one-piece since it would be more difficult if I had to change his diaper but this has never been an issue for me. The quality seems good and we have been using it for over 6 months of light-use with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ooksi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect swimsuit for little ones!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this(size 18 months) for my grandson's 1st birthday in January, to be used this summer. It will be the perfect size for him and looks absolutely adorable on him. It's cute, soft, comfy. Nice that it has sunblock built in. Easy to change a swim diaper, too. But my favorite is how ridiculously cute he looks in it. This can be paired with a navy or teal sun hat, and there is enough room for a swim diaper. I would definitely buy it again for another grandchild, and my daughter's friends have commented that they'd like one also. Huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Cazmei

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little snug but it was expected with the help of other previous reviews. The material is stretchy so it wasn't difficult for us to get it on our toddler. He's 15 months and we bought size 18-24M which fit perfectly. Zipper was difficult to control/zip at times. It tends to grab the fabric which then stop us from being able to zip/unzip further.
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality sewing but good design
customer_reviews.text: Not picky, but item has poor stitching quality. I only noticed because threads were popping out right at the neckline right after I took it out of the package. As I inspected the rest of the swimsuit, I noticed that fabric was damaged by an overly aggressive sew job (and the fabric cut lines are visibly jagged). Granted, I’m guessing that whoever sewed it probably isn’t getting paid to turn out fine work but is instead incentivized to produce a high quantity of garments. That’s the global economy. So that’s what ya get, a nice design with poor quality sewing. It’s semi-affordable, and I can’t sew, hence three stars.
customer_reviews.author: MaxTown

customer_reviews.title: NO DIAPER ACCESS!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! The quality is good. The material is wonderful. I absolutely love this swimsuit. My only and biggest problem is the diaper changes. I have to take the whole suit off my daughter to change her diaper. There is no diaper access via snaps between the legs and the zipper doesn’t come down far enough to make it possible to take the suit off her bottom half without fully u dressing her. I’m shocked clothes even exist for a 0-3months old without easy diaper access. ☹️ That’s the major thing that stops me from buying this swimsuit again when she’s older
customer_reviews.author: Booch

customer_reviews.title: For My Grandson
customer_reviews.text: My 1+ year old grandson lives in FL and they have an in-ground pool. They all love to swim and I wanted to get him something to protect his skin. I also purchased a hat to go with it. It fits him and they're starting the swimming season back up right now.
customer_reviews.author: Savivi

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Both cute and fictional! Size up so that it’s easier to change their swim diapers. Worked great on our cruise! Didn’t have to worry about sunscreen with this and a hat and water shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Johnson

customer_reviews.title: No bottom snaps for diapering
customer_reviews.text: This is cute and the size was great for my 3 month old, but diaper changing was a HUGE pain Bc there weren’t any bottom snaps. I learned that 3 months olds basically can’t go in the sun (or wear sunscreen) so having a rash guard is a little silly. In retrospect, I wouldn’t have bought this. Oh well!
customer_reviews.author: OrganicShopper

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Love this little swimsuit romper for my son. Got the 12 month size- he is 9 months, 17lb and skinny, but tall. Fits as expected, but if you have a chubby baby I would go up in size. It will definitely last him through the summer of beach and lake trips. Love that it covers his arms and I only need to put minimal sunscreen on his legs
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Bathing Suit
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the bathing suit. We've gotten a lot of use out of ours. I have purchased this in another size up and other colors/styles. Just watch the sizing. The suit has a size range, and when I purchased it it only listed the higher end of the range as what I was buying. So 36 months, was really a 24-36 months, and 24 months was really a 18-24 months. There isn't a huge different so I sized up. I pair it with the iPlay water diapers (which is worth getting 2 of).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality and fit.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and fit. I like that it is long sleeved so that his arms don't get burned while hanging out in his floaty. Pretty easy to get into but would be nicer if the zipper came all the way down. Material is of good quality and hasn't snagged or faded. Also love that there is a little protection from the zipper at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea214

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and stretchy!
customer_reviews.text: We have a three month old that we want to keep covered from the sun but still enjoy the summer with this year. This bathing suit is perfect! We did size up to 6 months based off other’s reviews and that was a good call. The material is stretchy and very helpful when dressing a little one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable.
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great for my little. He’s still able to wear it at 8 months. He first wore it at 4.5 months. I’d say it fits as expected, but not so snug that a baby will grow out of it quickly. I’d say it durable, too. It hasn’t faded or shown signs of wear in the 4 months using it. We don’t use it daily, but often.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan B.

customer_reviews.title: Fabric dye runs
customer_reviews.text: The pink/red dye used in this suit is terrible. I washed it before my daughter wore it, and it still ran so much I thought she was injured and bleeding at first. It stained our pool towels and blankets. It took several days of soaking it in the sink and ringing it out before the water ran clear. Then, of course, it was very faded. The fit is fine and it's really cute with the hat, but I would not have bought it if I'd known about the horrible fabric.
customer_reviews.author: MizzJane

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again! Great rash guard.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Exactly what I expected it to look and feel like - very soft material. Bought the 36 month size for my 15 month old because he is very tall and I wanted it to fit a bit loose. ...if it helps anyone he is 33 inches tall and I attached a photo for you to see how it fits. There is plenty of space for the reusable swim diaper. It’s easy to put on and take off. I wouldn’t change a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Silvana Radulescu

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, but wrong size sent.
customer_reviews.text: Sizing included 6-12 months or 12 months and I chose 12, however, 6-12 months was the size sent. It ended up fitting correctly, but be wary of possibly getting the incorrect size sent to you. The stitching in the arms seems a little weak and the arms are not very stretchy, but overall a good value considering these bodysuits branded are $40-50.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Doescher

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but buy a size or two up!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the 12 month size for my 9 month old. He is 31 inches tall and about 22 pounds. I read reviews and thought the 12 month would fit and it was extremely small. I returned it and decided to buy the 18 month size and it fits perfectly! Definitely buy a size up, but you will love this swim suit!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Sizing should be listed more accurately
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Only issue was sizing. I ordered a 3t which when arrived was a 24 month-36 month. If I had known I would have ordered a 4t. Probably will exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea O

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach/pool
customer_reviews.text: The swimsuit fit my son perfectly. He looked adorable in it and it provided great protection from the sun as well. My wife and I wished we had bought more than one for our vacation as he loved wearing it and we loved the way he looked in it and protected him from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute. Great for sunburn prevention
customer_reviews.text: Super cute on my toddler and really eased out minds on vacation. With most of his body being covered, we didn’t have to worry so much about sunburn.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice suit
customer_reviews.text: Great suit for a kid that is going to wear for one session. I love that it is all one piece, my kids are pale and they did not get sunburn while wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Mhart

customer_reviews.title: Bad for diaper changes
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Zipper could be a little longer just to make it easier to take on / off. Honestly it worked for us for a 20-min swim class, but I wouldn’t get it for a day at the pool/beach—too hard to do diaper changes.
customer_reviews.author: Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great suit, durable
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit, it's so cute! Great material, keeps my ten month old from burning wear it covers. I feel she's safe during pool days with this on and sun screen on the rest of her. Great colors that haven't faded and we've been washing and drying it all summer.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K

customer_reviews.title: Great baby suit.
customer_reviews.text: I’m thankful there was a 0-3 size option. My baby is 11.5 lbs and 23”, and it fit great! This is really cute and fit well. The zipper worked great and I like it on the front.
customer_reviews.author: MLM0822

customer_reviews.title: Perfect first bathing suit!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 18 month for my 14 mo old who is close to 50th percentile for height and weight. It fit great with just a little room to grow. Highly recommend this type of suit for the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: we love this, and it's actually easier to get him ...
customer_reviews.text: we love this, and it's actually easier to get him into this than into swim trunks. Less sunscreen to apply as well! Looks great, nice quality material.
customer_reviews.author: ERH

customer_reviews.title: Great suit, bought twice. Wish it went to 4t
customer_reviews.text: Love love this suit. Bought it two years in a row. Would of again but you don’t offer past a 3 . Love the look, feel, and the comfortable zipper that has material against the skin. No rubbing. Definitely a great buy
customer_reviews.author: anna giuliano

customer_reviews.title: The suit is adorable and we got lots of compliments/inquiries
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a newborn. The 0 to 3 size is geared towards a 3 month old. We were still able to use it. The suit is adorable and we got lots of compliments/inquiries. Would definitely recommend and buy in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: NYMom

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: For the price and fast shipping it looks great. It’s hard to find small suits anywhere so this was my only option for a 2 month old. I just hope the UPF is as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and excellent sun protection.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and excellent sun protection. My 3 year old loves this swimsuit. It is easy to put on and we don’t have to worry about reapplying sunscreen to his sensitive skin every hour!
customer_reviews.author: James Adam Gray

customer_reviews.title: Runs small.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute print, seems like great quality. It is SMAll. My 30 lb 21 month old had a tight fit in the 2t.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Moore

customer_reviews.title: Got it for my 12 month old, fits nicely
customer_reviews.text: Good fit on my 18lb 12 month old. Material seems stretchy so it can fit him for some time. Wish it was a a little longer to cover some of his lower legs as well, this sits right above the knees, especially when he moves around. Smelled a little funky, so definitely going to wash it before his first use as suggested on the tag.
customer_reviews.author: Sumbal

customer_reviews.title: Size is small.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 12 months. Not 6-12 months. The suit is labeled 6-12 months and when I first held it up, I thought "No Way is this going to fit. Baby was 9 months old and wearing (barely) 9 month clothes. It just barely fit and will not fit for long. It is cute though, nice fabric, nice colors, provides good coverage. The size is the only disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: LAUREN NEWBERRY

customer_reviews.title: Great Infant Bathing/Sun Suit
customer_reviews.text: Well made adorable infant bathing suit. We purchased mainly for the UV protection of our 6 week old grandson. He’s a big boy for his age at 10.5 lbs. but the 3-6 month size fit him nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Claudeo58

customer_reviews.title: As cute as a picture
customer_reviews.text: Cute and ready for the beach. Easy to put on my one year old son. Love the way it looks and the sun protection is another plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A

customer_reviews.title: Must have for baby!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS SUIT!!! My 9 mo, 17# baby fit perfectly in this with room to grow. I bought this for an indoor waterpark adventure, cold month of February, as I didn't feel comfortable with just a little bathing suit on her. I also, mentally, wanted some more protection with the chlorine. It was exactly what I was hoping for. I'm excited for her to enjoy it this summer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley from WI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toddler swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect swimsuit for my kiddo. Fit great and is very very cute. I love that my kid is covered in the water the whole time - no worries about a shirt riding up or shorts falling off and the zipper makes it easy to get on and off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get on and off - especially when wet!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my newborn - we however, only used it one time. It was sooo hard to get on and then even harder to get off once he was wet. I felt like I was really having to stretch it to get it through the arm holes. I wish the zipper went all the way down - would make it SO much easier to get on/off & change out the swim diaper!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashtin

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Snug Fit
customer_reviews.text: I got the 18 month size for my skinny tall 7 month old who is 22lb and it fits him perfectly- which I would have gotten the next size up so it would last a little longer. Super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Welch

customer_reviews.title: Best swim outfit I’ve bought
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, easy to get my son into. Keeps him covered and safe from the sun on most of his body. Bought another. Used for the pool and a trip to Maine for the beach
customer_reviews.author: ADK_MTBer

customer_reviews.title: Nice suit
customer_reviews.text: I like this swimsuit, except that I wish the legs were a little bit longer. They keep bunching up on my son's legs. Definitely provides great sun protection though.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great suit.
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and love the sleeves so we can use less sunblock. It has washed great, and my one-year-old son seems super comfortable wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Keli

customer_reviews.title: Great price & sun protection too!
customer_reviews.text: This is a darling swimsuit for our 4 mo. old grandson. Love that it has sun protection too. Will enjoy using this at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute-watch sizing
customer_reviews.text: Cute and did it’s job. I choose 12 month, I believe and it came as a 6-12 month. I was nervous that it wouldn’t fit, but luckily my little guy is on the smaller size. I would suggest going by range sizes not individual sizes. My son is currently 16 mon.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit!
customer_reviews.text: We get lots of compliments on this cute little suit at the pool! Great sun protection as well!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay S.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a family vacation to the beach. Loved the long sleeves. Kept baby from getting sun burned. Just what I was looking for. was good quality zipper and all. Looks better in person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great suit, easy on and off. Worked for sun protection!
customer_reviews.text: Great suit! Would buy again! Value for the money is great.
customer_reviews.author: Beardhole Hambleton

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Second one we’ve bought as he keeps sizing up.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: No regrets. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's great. Super cute while it's on. Protects my son from the sun really well. He is very fair skinned so it's nice to have something other than sunscreen to keep him safe. I love this so much I may purchase same suit in bigger size for next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really cute. Seems expensive
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my grand sons. They haven’t worn them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ruppe

customer_reviews.title: Too small—24 month fits like Carter's 12 month
customer_reviews.text: Very cute suit and nice material! Unfortunately it was way too small—couldn't even get it over my son's shoulders without a huge diaper wedgie...My son is 18 months old and wears 18-24 month clothes from Old Navy/Gap and Carter's. I ordered the swimsuit in 24 month size hoping it would fit through the upcoming summer but it is exactly the same size as his 12 month Carter's suit from last summer. Order a size or two larger.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: We all loved it, he is 4 months old
customer_reviews.text: This was soo cute on my grandson!!! We all loved it, he is 4 months old, weighs 14 pounds, bought the 9 months size, had to roll the sleeves up on it, but other than that it fit great!!
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6 Month Old
customer_reviews.text: Fit my six month old very well. Used at the beach and it helped project from the sun
customer_reviews.author: melony

customer_reviews.title: Cute and very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great suit for the beach on cooler days. It's very easy for my son to wear, and he does not complain about having to put it on. Very good material.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Twins

customer_reviews.title: 3t size is actually 24-36month
customer_reviews.text: If you are purchasing a 3t be warned that it is actually a 24-36month and not a 3t. My son is 30lbs so a 3t would have fit him perfect throughout the summer. This fits more in between a 24month and 36 month. So it was a bit too snug for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured and great quality. I got the 6-12 month size for ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured and great quality. I got the 6-12 month size for my 11 month old who wears 12nonth size clothes and it fits perfectly! Not tight but not saggy at all. Would recommend and order again!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten D.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute and functional. Protected my granddaughter from the sun, seemed to keep her warm enough in the cool water, and we received a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet P

customer_reviews.title: Very cute. Kind of wish it had crotch snaps ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Kind of wish it had crotch snaps. I hope it has the UV protection it boasts. Haven't any issues so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Similar HA
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Similar to our Hannas. No complaints after one season of use. We sized down as kiddo is thin.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: it looked assume together
customer_reviews.text: Things arrived well on time and worked out as a great bday gift for grandson in Tx
customer_reviews.author: Jmeevans

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t offer sun protection!
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit offers no sun protection! Our 21 month old was burned in the areas the suit covered. Super upset with this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on/ take off
customer_reviews.text: I wish this had snaps by the legs because it was really hard to get this suit on my son, and then having to take the whole thing off for every diaper change was not fun. The size runs small and if your baby has chunky thighs, getting it on and off will be a STRUGGLE.
customer_reviews.author: MeikaS

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Terrible item. Purchased with the impression that it would be 50 UPF but the tag said 30 and the entire item smells like chemicals
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and very well made and durable seeming! My Grandson has not worn it yet, but i am sure, from the way it is made, it will be great!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good construction, nice material.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice article of clothing. It’s perfect for time at the pool without getting sun burned.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and fits perfect. I will say when you order a size 6 month s, they will send you a 3-6 month size. So if you have a big 6 month old, I’d size up.
customer_reviews.author: SJ02

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Cute suit with extra sun protection. Sturdy zipper and easy on/off
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M MacBlane

customer_reviews.title: Sizing FYI
customer_reviews.text: Cute and seems to be good quality, however...be aware that the "12 month" size is actually a size 6-12 month. There's a big size difference between 12 month and 6-12 month. I would have gotten the "18 month" had I known that. Likely will be returning for a different size, but pretty annoyed as I had planned to have it in time for our upcoming vacation.
customer_reviews.author: BKW123

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit zipper broke the second time we used it. After the first use, the bottom had pilled all over and the fabric was ruined. Very poor quality. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: We loved this for Hawaii
customer_reviews.text: We loved this for Hawaii. It fit perfect and covered his top half. If ou are looking to cover the legs this is not the one.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great one piece swimsuit .
customer_reviews.text: Great one piece swimsuit. Though I wish the leg part be longer but other than that great item.
customer_reviews.author: Yani

customer_reviews.title: The product quality is good BUT!
customer_reviews.text: The product quality is good BUT!!! I was sent the incorrect size. I ordered a size 6mnths but was sent 3-6months which is very petite. My baby has no use for that now. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rajkumar Khurana

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is wrong
customer_reviews.text: The suit was so cute but i ordered 2 year but received 18-24 months. TWICE! Such a waste of time. Why have an 18-24 month option and a 2 year option if they are the same thing. They are very different when sizing a 2+ year old.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Klise

customer_reviews.title: Cute an nice fabric. I bought for my daughter to wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute an nice fabric. I bought for my daughter to wear now and hand down to my son in a year or so.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Bish

customer_reviews.title: Made very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This looked adorable at the beach on our grandson. It was awesome for keeping the sand from rubbing a rash between his chubby legs! That was actually the reason it was purchased and it did the job while looking precious at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love the one piece for my fearless one year old
customer_reviews.text: Love the one piece for my fearless one year old! Good quality fabric and holds up well in the pool! Arrived on time!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Poor fabric quality. Fit well though.
customer_reviews.text: Poor fabric quality. Sand is stuck in the fabric. Its pulling immediately. Otherwise cute but poor quality fabric compared to one we had before.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Item color different than pictured...
customer_reviews.text: Runs a bit small. Color received was not as pictured. Navy blue is more of a gray in the suit, so overall much lighter in color. Would've preferred the blue as shown.
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: Cool but not what I expected ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I ordered .. I don t know where come from the shark and the sleeves aren t as long as expected ...
customer_reviews.author: Dorat

customer_reviews.title: 12 Months... really 6/12 months
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed. I purchased one of the suits listed as "12 Months". The inside of the tag say 6/12 months. Only reason I did not give 1 star, it is super cute and will be returning for bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: MEGAN MILLER

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit and fabric but the crotch lining could be better
customer_reviews.text: I love it generally but the crotch area has started to unravel after 4 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Distraction

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It is super cute but does not have buttons on the bottom so you have to take the whole suit off just to change a diaper. My baby was not able to wear it because the zipper was broken when I received it in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Hillari

customer_reviews.title: Broken zipper
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this for our son but after less than month the zipper broke making it useless. Super disappointed that we bought this and only got to use it a handful of times.
customer_reviews.author: MAC1985

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! My son is 2 1/2 years old and weighs 31lbs. The 3t fits him great (loose not sung) with plenty room to grow. I like this suit because you don't have to pull it over your child's head.
customer_reviews.author: Nick and Miranda

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! I love the rash guard type suits to help guard against the suns rays. This suit is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: jobria mccray

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: So cute! My boy looks adorable in this swimsuit. Fits great. Also, long sleeves are best to protect the delicate baby skin. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mariya Mar

customer_reviews.title: Comfy beachwear
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for days at the beach! It kept my son protected from the sun and still was comfortable enough for him to move around in.
customer_reviews.author: MMZoo

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute suit
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute suit! We bought this for my son’s first swim in Kauai and the material is thick enough to block out the sun and stretchy enough to get on/off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

product_meta.title: Baby Beach One-Piece Swimsuit UPF 50+ -Sun Protective Sunsuit
product_meta.description: Give Your Little The Sun Protection , Stretchy Nylon/Lycra Blend Provides UPF 50+ "Excellent" Sun Protection Rashguard
feature_bullets: Baby Beach One-Piece Swimsuit :Give Your Little The Sun Protection
